roleset.name: admire
roleset.note: WORSHIP-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from worship.01-v)

example.name: without cause
example.text: Disciples of Tibetan lamas have worshiped next door to followers of the mother goddess Matzu, and gents from northeast China have made brides of Penghu ladies.
example.arg: next door to followers of the mother goddess Matzu
